newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Apr 1st 10 days trade surplus 94.27 bln yen.
newsitem.headline: Japan Apr 1st 10 days trade surplus 94.27 bln yen.

text.p: Japan posted a customs-cleared trade surplus of 94.27 billion yen in the first 10 days of April, compared with a deficit of 240.32 billion yen in the same period a year earlier, the Finance Ministry said on Thursday.
Free-on-board (FOB) exports rose 32.8 percent from a year earlier to 1.496 trillion yen while cost, insurance and freight (CIF) imports rose 2.5 percent to 1.402 trillion yen.
